verses.verse: <S%H5281>Naomi<s%> her <S%H2545>mother-in<s%>-law <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1323>her,<s%> "My daughter, shall I not <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H4494>rest<s%> for <S%H3190>you,<s%> that it may be well with you?

Now <S%H1162>isn't<s%> Boaz our <S%H4130>kinsman,<s%> with whose <S%H5291>maidens<s%> you <S%H2219>were?<s%> Behold, he winnows <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H3915>tonight<s%> in the threshing <S%H1637>floor.<s%>

Therefore <S%H7364>wash<s%> <S%H5480>yourself,<s%> anoint <S%H7760>yourself,<s%> get <S%H8071>dressed,<s%> and go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the threshing <S%H1637>floor,<s%> but <S%H3045>don't<s%> make yourself known to the <S%H376>man<s%> until he has <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking.<s%>

It shall <S%H7901>be,<s%> when he lies down, that you shall <S%H3045>mark<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> where he shall <S%H7901>lie,<s%> and you shall go <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H1540>uncover<s%> his <S%H4772>feet,<s%> and lay <S%H7901>down;<s%> then he will <S%H5046>tell<s%> you what you shall <S%H6213>do.<s%>"
She <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>her,<s%> "All that you say I will <S%H6213>do.<s%>"
She went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the threshing <S%H1637>floor,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> according to all that her <S%H2545>mother-in<s%>-law told <S%H6680>her.<s%>

When <S%H1162>Boaz<s%> had <S%H398>eaten<s%> and <S%H8354>drunk,<s%> and his <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H3190>merry,<s%> he <S%H935>went<s%> to lie <S%H7901>down<s%> at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the heap of <S%H6194>grain.<s%> She <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3909>softly,<s%> <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H4772>feet,<s%> and laid her <S%H7901>down.<s%>
It happened at <S%H2677>midnight,<s%> that the <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H2729>startled<s%> and <S%H3943>turned<s%> <S%H802>himself;<s%> and behold, a woman <S%H7901>lay<s%> at his <S%H4772>feet.<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Who are <S%H559>you?<s%>" She answered, <S%H7327>"I<s%> am your <S%H519>handmaid.<s%> Therefore <S%H6566>spread<s%> your <S%H3671>skirt<s%> over your <S%H519>handmaid;<s%> for you are a near <S%H1350>kinsman.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> are you by <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> my <S%H1323>daughter.<s%> You have <S%H3190>shown<s%> more <S%H2617>kindness<s%> in the latter <S%H314>end<s%> than at the <S%H7223>beginning,<s%> inasmuch as you <S%H1115>didn't<s%> <S%H3212>follow<s%> young <S%H970>men,<s%> whether <S%H1800>poor<s%> or <S%H6223>rich.<s%>

<S%H1323>Now,<s%> my daughter, <S%H3372>don't<s%> be afraid; I will <S%H6213>do<s%> to you all that you <S%H559>say;<s%> for all the <S%H8179>city<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> does <S%H3045>know<s%> that you are a <S%H2428>worthy<s%> <S%H802>woman.<s%>
Now it is <S%H551>true<s%> that I am a near <S%H1350>kinsman;<s%> however there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H1350>kinsman<s%> nearer than <S%H7138>I.<s%>

<S%H3885>Stay<s%> this <S%H3915>night,<s%> and it shall be in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> that if he will perform for you the part of a <S%H1350>kinsman,<s%> <S%H2896>well;<s%> let him do the <S%H1350>kinsman<s%>'s part. But if he <S%H2654>will<s%> not do the part of a <S%H1350>kinsman<s%> for <S%H1350>you,<s%> then will I do the part of a kinsman for <S%H3068>you,<s%> as Yahweh <S%H2416>lives.<s%> Lie <S%H7901>down<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>"

She <S%H7901>lay<s%> at his <S%H4772>feet<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning.<s%> She rose <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H2958>before<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> could <S%H5234>discern<s%> <S%H7453>another.<s%> For he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let it not be <S%H3045>known<s%> that the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the threshing <S%H1637>floor.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3051>"Bring<s%> the <S%H4304>mantle<s%> that is on <S%H270>you,<s%> and hold <S%H270>it.<s%>" She held <S%H4058>it;<s%> and he measured <S%H8337>six<s%> measures of <S%H8184>barley,<s%> and <S%H7896>laid<s%> it on <S%H935>her;<s%> and he went into the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

When she <S%H935>came<s%> to her <S%H2545>mother-in<s%>-law, she <S%H559>said,<s%> "How did it <S%H1323>go,<s%> my daughter?" She <S%H559>told<s%> her all that the <S%H376>man<s%> had done to <S%H6213>her.<s%>

She <S%H559>said,<s%> "He <S%H5414>gave<s%> me these <S%H8337>six<s%> measures of <S%H8184>barley;<s%> for he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H935><s%> 'Don't go <S%H7387>empty<s%> to your <S%H2545>mother-in<s%>-law.'"

Then she <S%H559>said,<s%> "Sit <S%H3427>still,<s%> my <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> until you <S%H3045>know<s%> how the <S%H1697>matter<s%> will <S%H5307>fall;<s%> for the <S%H376>man<s%> will not <S%H8252>rest,<s%> <S%H518>until<s%> he has <S%H3615>finished<s%> the <S%H1697>thing<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%>"
